MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW2 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Walthall St, Nantwich Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.11am. Our engineers are on site working on the repairs to the underground cable fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on 16th of Jan 2021.
